description:
Pursue your passion for the outdoors and over rocky, muddy terrain. With the feel of an athletic shoe and the support and stability of a hiking boot, the Rush TRK LT is ready for anything from high-mileage hikes to fast-packing missions. The lightweight construction won't weigh you down and the Presa® outsole cushions rough trails and provides grip wherever your adventure takes you.

  • Durable ripstop uppers with 3D Auto-Fit collar for comfortable support
  • GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort membrane for waterproofness and breathability
  • DST frame stabilizes feet and provides torsional rigidity
  • Dual-density compression-molded EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Presa® outsole with SuperGum rubber and IKS technology absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
name: Scarpa Rush Trek LT Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
